name: Product Owner (Computing Hardware)
description:
Comino - is an international manufacturing company that designs liquid-cooled plug and play computers for retail and business. Our devices are used for many applications, such as 3D Graphics Rendering, Artificial Intelligence, Password Recovery, Gaming.

We're currently recruiting a Product Manager/Product Owner (Computing Hardware) who will be responsible for maintaining and developing a project of the Workstation PC Comino RM - high-performance 6-GPU computing machine with power up to 2.2 kW.

As a Hardware Product Manager/Product Owner, you will engage with business and engineering teams to plan, investigate and launch improvement initiatives and product releases. You will leverage your exceptional organizational and communication skills to balance workloads and expectations, while also using your analytical chops to synthesize product usage trends and identify opportunities to improve the users’ experience.

The applicant is required to be fluent in English, to have thorough knowledge of modern computer architecture (CPU, GPU), an understanding of the application software market where such kind of equipment is used, experience with similar products and a proactive approach to life.

We are looking for an applicant who wants to take part in designing a unique computing machine, being sold all over the world. Follow the link to watch the review of the prototype PC on the Linus TechTips channel (Canada) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Fbf4800fkfQ&t=1s

We are hiring an employee in the Moscow office located near the metro station Ulitsa 1905 Goda. Work schedule from 10am to 19 pm.

Responsibilities:

  • Collaborate with the Executive Team to further refine the product vision, strategy and metrics, and define business and technical product requirements;

  • Define product use cases and analyze the requirements to meet such use cases;

  • Manage the product requirements throughout the product and project lifecycles;

  • Support ongoing and new initiatives including functional documentation of existing applications, contributing to the development of functional requirements for new applications and enhancements;

  • participating in activities throughout the project life cycle;

  • Examine competitive solutions and develop metrics comparing product capabilities;

  • Work cross-functionally with internal team members;

  • Collaborate with business partners to develop product strategy and drive project initiatives;

  • Plan, organize, and monitor requirements specifications;

  • Support day-to-day system use, resolve issues. This includes maintaining support and system documentation, escalating and tracking systems issues when necessary to insure issues are satisfactorily resolved;

  • Communicate the solution design/requirements to both Product Development teams and business teams;

  • Translating and simplifying requirements for both development and business;

  • Translate system functionality into business relevant language;

  • Document and communicate system changes to the business and members. Participate in change management internally with departments and end-users;

  • Work with Hardware and Software Development teams to implement the solutions and perform system testing and data validations;

  • Coordinate with QA Manager to facilitate UAT activities with end users/testers;

  • Manage defect tracking and resolution during development and UAT with Product Development and Vendor (if required);

  • Assist with creating training materials (i.e. videos or summary guides) and conduct end user training sessions upon request;

  • Assist with creating marketing materials;

  • Assist with creating tech specs/ user manual / how to materials;

Requirements:

  • Fluent English (Upper Intermediate);

  • Up-to-date knowledge in computing equipment architectures;

  • Experience in operating high performance computing equipment (CPU- and GPU-driven, hardware and software);

  • Technical degree;

  • Structured approach to problem solving;

  • Experience in managing a team of 5-10 people;

  • Resistance to stress, initiative.

An advantage:

  • Experience in CAD design;

  • Experience in Computing equipment assembly;

  • Knowledge in Liquid-cooling technologies;

We offer:

  • Working in an international fast-growing company;

  • Young professional team;

  • Opportunity of career advancement
